Dwarf gang members are the cronies of Hammerspike Stoutbeard, and are encountered during the One Small Favour quest. They live in the Dwarven Mine below Ice Mountain.

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
Dwarven Mine44, 48, 493Maplink

'''Dwarf gang members''' are the cronies of [[Hammerspike Stoutbeard]], and are encountered during the [[One Small Favour]] [[Quests|quest]]. They live in the [[Dwarven Mine]] below [[Ice Mountain]].
